Token.Abstract: Defines extensions to UIImage that adds thumbnail generation
Returns an image that is a thumbnail of the given image.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The location of the image to generate a thumbnail of.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: The size that the generated thumbnail will be.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A NSImage that contains a thumbnail of the image at url that is size.

Token.Abstract: Returns an image that is a thumbnail of the given image.

Parameter.Name: image
Parameter.Abstract: The image to generate a thumbnail of.

Parameter.Name: size
Parameter.Abstract: The size that the generated thumbnail will be.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A NSImage that contains a thumbnail of the image that is size.
